Concept ACK.

How do the call-sites of this function cope with this exception? I _suppose_ this is only used in reindexing?
There are actually no call sites for this before #7933...\n

CDataStream::ignore -> CScriptCompressor::Unserialize -> CTxOutCompressor::SerializationOp

CCoins::GetSerializeSize,Serialize,Unserialize
CTxInUndo::GetSerializeSize,Serialize,Unserialize

Still working on what calls those...
@pstratem I believe it is. I'm going to include it in #7933, as without it, the test I'm adding for it fails...\n
@sipa Indeed since this can only be triggered by disk corruption... all bets are off anyways\n
